channel.title: Thoughts on A Thoughtful Goose
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on A Thoughtful Goose

item.title: The Purpose of Life
item.description: This Isn’t About You So lets start by being clear with what I mean by “purpose for Life”. What I’m referring to is the chemical process we call Life, the one that would be observable from some outside being if they were to come across Earth. Just like we’re currently looking for something we can call Life on exoplanets. That’s Life with the capital ‘L’, and it includes your life and every other life on the planet.
